revision.comment: Moved the Lindisfarne entry to the correct alphabetic sort position
revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Down|down|down-}} '''Down''' is the relative vertical direction opposed to [[Relative direction|up]].
'''Down''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}}
==Places== * [[List of downs]], a list of downland locations called "Down"
===Northern Ireland, UK=== * [[Down (Northern Ireland Parliament constituency)]], a county constituency of the Parliament of Northern Ireland from 1921 to 1929 * [[Down (UK Parliament constituency)]], a UK Parliament constituency in Ireland from 1801 to 1885 and 1922 to 1950 * [[County Down]], a county within Northern Ireland
===Republic of Ireland=== * [[Down, County Westmeath]], a townland in the civil parish of Tyfarnham, barony of Corkaree
==People== * [[Down (surname)]] * [[John Langdon Down]] (1828â€“1896), British physician best known for his description of Down syndrome * [[Lesley-Anne Down]] (born 1954), English actress, former model, and singer * [[Down AKA Kilo]] (born 1985), American rapper from Oxnard, California
==Arts, entertainment, and media== ===Music=== ====Groups and labels==== * [[Down (band)]], an American southern heavy metal supergroup
====Albums==== * [[Down (The Jesus Lizard album)|''Down'' (The Jesus Lizard album)]], 1994 album by the Chicago band The Jesus Lizard * [[Down (Sentenced album)|''Down'' (Sentenced album)]], 1996 gothic metal album by Sentenced
====Songs==== * [[Down (311 song)|"Down" (311 song)]], a song by the band 311 * [[Down (Blink-182 song)|"Down" (Blink-182 song)]], 2003 single by Blink-182 * [[Down (Fifth Harmony song)|"Down" (Fifth Harmony song)]], 2017 song by Fifth Harmony * [[Down (Jay Sean song)|"Down" (Jay Sean song)]], 2009 R&B-electropop song by British artist Jay Sean * [[Down (The Kooks song)|"Down" (The Kooks song)]], 2014 song by British indie rock band The Kooks * [[Down (R.K.M & Ken-Y song)|"Down" (R.K.M & Ken-Y song)]], 2006 reggaeton single by RKM & Ken-Y * [[Down (Stone Temple Pilots song)|"Down" (Stone Temple Pilots song)]], 1999 song by American rock band Stone Temple Pilots * [[Down (Marian Hill song)|"Down" (Marian Hill song)]], 2016 song by American electronic duo Marian Hill * "Down", a single by [[Modern Day Zero#Mesh STL (2001-2003)|Modern Day Zero]] * "Down", a song by Chris Brown from ''[[Exclusive (album)|Exclusive]]'' * "Down", a song by Earshot from ''[[Two (Earshot album)|Two]]'' * "Down", a song by Gravity Kills from their self-titled 1996 debut album ''[[Gravity Kills (album)|Gravity Kills]]'' * "Down", a song by Juelz Santana from ''[[From Me to U]]'' * "Down", a song by Kutless from ''[[Kutless (album)|Kutless]]'' * "Down", a song by [[Lindisfarne (band)|Lindisfarne]], from "[[Nicely Out of Tune]]" * "Down", a song by Mat Kearney from ''[[Young Love (Mat Kearney album)|Young Love]]'' * "Down", a song by Miles Davis released on ''[[Birdland 1951]]'' * "Down", a song by Motograter off their album [[Motograter (album)|''Motograter'']] * "Down", a song by Pearl Jam from ''[[Lost Dogs (album)|Lost Dogs]]'' * "Down", a song by Pitchshifter from ''[[PSI (album)|PSI]]'' * "Down", a song by The Prom Kings from their [[The Prom Kings|self-titled album]] * "Down", a song by Seether from ''[[Holding Onto Strings Better Left to Fray]]'' * "Down", a song by Widespread Panic from ''[[Don't Tell the Band]]'' * "Down", a song by Yelawolf from ''[[Shady XV]]'' * "Down", a song by Davido from ''[[Omo Baba Olowo]]'' * "Down", a song by Brymo from ''[[Merchants, Dealers & Slaves]]'' * "[[Down Down]]", a 1975 song by the English rock band Status Quo
===Other uses in arts, entertainment, and media=== * [[Down (Breaking Bad)|"Down" (''Breaking Bad'')]], an episode from season two of TV series ''Breaking Bad'' * [[Down (comics)|''Down'' (comics)]], a comic book published by Top Cow Productions * [[Down (film)|''Down'' (film)]], a 2001 English remake of the film ''De Lift'', about an express elevator that develops a mind of its own * [[Down (Into the Dark)|"Down" (''Into the Dark'')]], an episode of the first season of ''Into the Dark'' * [[Down (novel)|''Down'' (novel)]], a 1997 Bernice Summerfield novel by Lawrence Miles
==Direction== * [[Rail directions]], where ''down'' and ''up'' have locally significant meanings * [[Relative direction]], where ''down'' is the direction towards the centre of gravity of a celestial object
==Other uses== * [[Down (game theory)]], a standard position in mathematical game theory * [[Down (gridiron football)]], in American/Canadian football, a period of time where one play takes place * [[Down feather]], a soft bird feather frequently used in manufacture of bedding * [[Down GAA]], responsible for the administration of Gaelic games in County Down * [[Down payment]], a term used in the context of the purchase of items * [[Down quark]], an elementary constituent of matter * [[Down syndrome]], a genetic disorder * [[Downland]], a type of hill
==See also== * [[DN (disambiguation)]] * [[Downhill (disambiguation)]] * [[Downs (disambiguation)]] * [[Downstair]] * [[Downstairs (disambiguation)]] * [[Downtown (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}}
